title: When is account sharing going to be looked into?
body:
Account sharing on OCE from gold down is just atrocious.

Its just anti-fun and really frustrating to deal with.
you have to watch these people play better than you, stomp the map then 2 weeks later fall down the ladder because the original owner cannot handle the ELO the previous user set for them..

Its a vicious cycle and it makes climbing in silver extremely hard to achieve. 

Whats frustrating to me is there is no response from riot, or even what could be considered a proactive crackdown on behaviours that conflict with the rules of the game.

Just don't feel like enough care for OCE or its players is being achieved.


Sorry about the rant.
